title: RD - You Don't Know Business
itunes:title: RD - You Don't Know Business
description:
Adam and Mark connect remotely to discuss the recent developments in the Bill Cosby trial out of Santa Monica, including some details that have gone largely under-reported.  They also discuss the January 6th Commission as well as Adam's passionate feelings about food delivery apps.

Watch this episode & subscribe on YouTube at YouTube.com/AdamCarolla

Please Support Our Sponsors
